mapper.insert: INSERT INTO setting (username, start_ymd, end_ymd, activity, museum, cafe, tour_att) VALUES (#{username}, #{startYmd}, #{endYmd}, #{activity}, #{museum}, #{cafe}, #{tourAtt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE start_ymd=#{startYmd}, end_ymd=#{endYmd}, activity=#{activity}, museum=#{museum}, cafe=#{cafe}, tour_att=#{tourAtt}
